thread.title: Raymond Magura
thread.title_full: YIPPEE TECH reviewed by Raymond Magura

author: Raymond Magura
title: Raymond Magura
text: I am impressed by the service and the product offered and the delivery of the service in a secure manner. It has been a brilliant eye opener and I will definitely recommend Yippee tech, its employees/operatives and technicians to all and sundry. Excellent product and service. Thank you.
